Name: Lingsha
Desc: The new Cauldron Master of the Xianzhou Luofu's Alchemy Commission is one perceptive and intelligent Vidyadhara healer.\nWith a keen sense of smell, she diagnoses ailments and calms minds with aromatic therapy.\nAdept at navigating complex social relationships, she can remain impeccably composed even when turmoil rages within.

1.Name: Bloom on Vileward Bouquet
1.Desc: Lingsha's Weakness Break Efficiency increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>. When an enemy unit's Weakness is Broken, reduces their DEF by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

2.Name: Leisure in Carmine Smokeveil
2.Desc: When using Ultimate, increases all allies' Break Effect by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

3.Name: Shine of Floral Wick
3.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

4.Name: Redolence from Canopied Banquet
4.Desc: When Fuyuan takes action, restores HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Lingsha's ATK for the ally whose current HP is the lowest.

5.Name: Poise Atop Twists and Turns
5.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

6.Name: Arcadia Under Deep Seclusion
6.Desc: While "Fuyuan" is on the field, reduces all Enemy units' All-Type RES by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When "Fuyuan" attacks, additionally deals <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> instance(s) of DMG, with each instance dealing Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of Lingsha's ATK and <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> Toughness Reduction to one random Enemy unit. This prioritizes targets with both Toughness greater than 0 and Fire Weakness.

122201.Name: Votive Incense
122201.Desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Lingsha's ATK to a single target enemy.

122202.Name: Smoke and Splendor
122202.Desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Lingsha's ATK to all enemies and at the same time, restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Lingsha's ATK plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak></color> for all allies. Fuyuan's <u>action advances</u> by <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak>.

122203.Name: Dripping Mistscape
122203.Desc: Inflicts "Befog" on all enemies. While in "Befog," targets receive <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color> increased <u>Break DMG</u>, lasting for <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nDeals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Lingsha's ATK to all enemies, and at the same time restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Lingsha's ATK plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak></color> for all allies. Fuyuan's <u>action advances</u> by <unbreak>#6[i]%</unbreak>.

122204.Name: Mistdance Manifest
122204.Desc:
When using Skill, summons Fuyuan, with an initial SPD of <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> and an initial action count of <unbreak>#7[i]</unbreak>.
When taking action, Fuyuan launches <u>follow-up attack</u>, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Lingsha's ATK to all enemies. Additionally deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#8[i]%</unbreak></color> of Lingsha's ATK to a single random enemy, and this DMG prioritizes targets that have both Toughness greater than 0 and Fire Weakness. Dispels <unbreak>#6[i]</unbreak> <u>debuff(s)</u> from all allies and restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Lingsha's ATK plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak></color>.
Fuyuan's action count can accumulate up to <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak>. When the action count reaches 0 or when Lingsha is <u>knocked down</u>, Fuyuan disappears.
While Fuyuan is on the field, using Skill can increase Fuyuan's action count by <unbreak>#7[i]</unbreak>.

122206.Name: Attack
122206.Desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

122207.Name: Wisps of Aurora
122207.Desc: After using Technique, immediately summons Fuyuan at the start of the next battle and inflicts "Befog" on all enemies, lasting for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

1.PointDesc: Increases this unit's ATK or Outgoing Healing by an amount equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>/<unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Break Effect, up to a maximum increase of <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>/<unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> respectively.
When using Basic ATK, additionally regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

When Fuyuan is on the field and any ally character takes DMG or consumes HP, if a character in the team has their current HP percentage lower than or equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, Fuyuan will immediately launch the Talent's follow-up attack. This does not consume Fuyuan's action count. This effect can trigger again after <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
